job.title: Site Reliability Engineer Lead - Remote
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Information Services
job.description: <p><strong><u>Details are as follows:</u></strong></p><p><strong>Job position: Site Reliability Engineer Lead</strong></p><p><strong> </strong>Location : Remote</p><p>Duration: 12 months+ [Long term]</p><p>Immediate Interview/ Start</p><p><br></p><p> <strong><u>**Please NOTE: We have positions open in CANADA and US both **</u></strong></p><p><br></p><ul><li>10+ years Total IT experience.</li><li><strong>Healthcare experience is required </strong></li><li><strong>Experience of at least 5 years within an Enterprise SRE configuration (Mandatory)</strong></li><li>L2 L3 Productions support</li><li>Blue Green deployment</li><li><strong>Managed on site and off site resources</strong></li><li><strong>AWS: 4 years (Mandatory)-</strong> AWS Cost Optimization, Developing applications in an AWS environment &amp; Terraform.</li><li>Debugging production issues: 4+ years (Mandatory). Python: 2-3 years (Mandatory) - DJango, Celery.</li><li>Good to have: AWS Certified.</li><li><strong>Experience in with development technology stack-Docker, Python, Django, Celery, Postgres</strong>. </li><li><strong>AWS serverless technologies (Lambda, Cognito, API Gateway, Step Functions, AppSync)</strong></li><li>Experience in operational technology stack (Uwsgi, Nginx, RabbitMQ, Elasticsearch, Redis). </li><li>Experience with automation tools- Salt, Vagrant, Packer. </li><li>Experience with metrics and orchestration tools-Jenkins, NewRelic, Datadog, Loggly.</li><li>He/ She needs to be the best buddy of Key IT Stakeholders and sponsors.&nbsp;</li></ul><p></p>
